title: Drawing, "Tapestry Design for "Neighborhood""
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Design of overlapping houses with steeply-pitched rooves.  One tall leafless three at right, smaller trees recede at upper edge into left distance.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Tapestry Design for "Neighborhood"".
Pastel, graphite on cream paper. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-55.
